page.title: 10LAND RECLAMATION_VALLEYFIELD
page.content: At Low Valleyfield on the site of the {Valleyfield Pit}which was demolished in 1981, the{S.S.E.B.}have begun a large scale land reclamation project. This is a ten year project. The intention is to reclaim land on the {mudflats of the River Forth}out to as} far as Preston Island. The land is being built up with waste fly ash from Longannet Power Station firther along the River at Kincardine. Already this project is well underway and trees have been planted. It is intended that eventually thousands of trees will be planted here.
